text: The 1949 Volta a Catalunya was the 29th edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 18 September to 25 September 1949. The race started in Montjuïc and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Émile Rol. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 46" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 46" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 30" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 5' 31" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 7' 03" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 8' 18" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 8' 19" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 11' 02" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 13' 07" |} |} ==References== 1949 Volta Category:1949 in Spanish road cycling Category:September 1949 sports events
title: 1949 Volta a Catalunya
